resources.string: Login or Sign up to your account
Here you will find everything you are looking for from different types of shoes and their different brands.
Hope you enjoy your time in our app.
1- When you open the application for the first time, you must create a new account and then press login.
2- Then you will go directly to the welcome page.
3- Then you will be taken to the instructions page, where you are currently standing.
4- After that, you will go to the store where all the added shoes are displayed.
5- From the buttons in the store, you will be taken to a page from which you can add shoes after filling in the required information about the shoes.
Enter the description of the shoes
